data.name: Light The Lamp Hockey
data.detailed_description:
Old School Hockey Gaming in a Beer league coat of paint! Welcome to the most dynamic 8-ish bit hockey experience you could have ever asked for.
Built on simplicity and full of depth, Take your team to the playoffs and win the almighty 'Ship!

Features
-Beer League Hockey full of Beer League Events! Blown calls, Quick Whistles, Players that are busy on game day!
-3 on 3 Arcade gameplay, Best with friends! 4 Players field a whole team!
-Full Dynamics, Each game plays differently and you must adapt your strategy to win the game!
-Simple 2 button game play, Much like the 8 bit games of old.
-Franchise Mode, Survive 10 seasons with your team!
-Deep Arcade Mode with dynamic leaderboards and sessions to give you that Quick Challenge before you get back to life.
-Runs like a Scalded dog!

COMING SOON! Stay Tuned for Expected Release Dates.

pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7, 10, 11
  • Processor: 3Ghz or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 2D Graphics Card
